meanings.definition: Exhausted or extremely tired from too much physical or mental exertion.
meanings.sent1: After the long hike, Sarah felt overfatigued and could barely keep her eyes open.
meanings.sent2: The athlete was overfatigued after the intense training session.
meanings.sent3: Even the energetic puppy looked overfatigued after playing all day.
meanings.sent4: Her brain felt overfatigued, like a tired engine struggling to keep running.
meanings.sent5: The students were overfatigued after studying for hours without a break.

meanings.definition: To become excessively fatigued or worn out.
meanings.sent1: If you overwork yourself, you may quickly become overfatigued.
meanings.sent2: He overfatigued his muscles by lifting weights that were too heavy.
meanings.sent3: The robot overfatigued itself trying to complete all the tasks at once.
meanings.sent4: The old car engine overfatigued and finally gave out on the highway.
meanings.sent5: She overfatigued her voice by shouting at the concert all night.
